message: Let's make a deal! I propose I take $700,000, leaving you with a respectable $300,000.  Consider how much the money will depreciate if we wait!
Let's find a middle ground. Considering the depreciation, I think this is a fair split.
Bob, time is running out!  My last offer was more than generous. I'm willing to take a little less this round at $650,000, but we need to close this deal now before the money dwindles even further.
It's getting late in the game, and the money is worth less each round. I think an even split is more than fair at this point.
